thread.title: Adam
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Adam

author: Adam
title: Adam
text: After my wife finding a barbour coat in the shops I looked online as was not willing to pay the price she wanted. Country attire was selling the coat at Â£60 less than stores and other websites. This made me happy and the wife warm which cut on the heating bill also. I have used the website in the past when again being tight and always found prices great and service and delivery spot on. Couldn't fault the company.
